Daniele completed his Bachelor of Science in Psychology and Communication at the University of Milan - Bicocca in 2018. He joined the University of Auckland in 2021 as an Honours student. He is now starting a PhD working with Paul Corballis, director of the Cognitive Psychophysiology Lab and co-advised by Christopher Erb. He is interested in investigating the neural correlates of consciousness using EEG, eye-tracking and whatever machine he can get his hands on. He has a second identity as a magician and his assistant is a tiny blue plunger.
